title: Am I the only one that thinks yasuo is super underbuffed?
body: So I've been playing a bit of Yasuo lately and I have seen that his ultimate no longer gives you the base 50% armour pen, instead now it gives you 50% of your critical strike as armour pen. It doesn't seem too bad because you still get it right? Well if you're playing Yasuo top lane, if you're against a tank, you are screwed over until you get pd and ie. And his q tornado had a major debuff too, as it still does the damage, but the tornado lasts for six seconds, not ten. That's a big debuff when you think about it. I've been going to tornado someone and my tornado disappears. I just look like a mental using my q on nothing. And please don't comment on this saying "WhAT ArE YoU TaLkInG AbOuT YaSuO iS oP!!!!!!!1111" Because he's not op, whoever played him is just skilled.
